definition: non-Han people, esp. to the East of China/barbarians/to wipe out/to exterminate/to tear down/to raze
see 郎格罕氏島|郎格罕氏岛[Lang2 ge2 han3 shi4 dao3]

sentences.english: Amylin is headquartered in San Diego, California.
sentences.chinese: 胰澱素是總部設在加利福尼亞州聖迭戈。

sentences.english: Surgery was curative in 54 patients and palliative in 27 patients.
sentences.chinese: 行胰十二指腸切除術54例，姑息性手術27例。

sentences.english: AIM The colon absorption of pancreatic kininogenase was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察胰激肽原酶的大鼠結腸吸收。

sentences.english: Objective To sum up the experiences of simultaneous kidney-pancreas transplantation (SKPT) with enteric drainage of pancreatic secretion (ED).
sentences.chinese: 目的總結腸腔引流式胰腎聯合移植圍手術期處理經驗。

sentences.english: Pancreatic fistula was the most frequent complication.
sentences.chinese: 胰瘻是胰島素瘤手術後最常見的併發症。

sentences.english: The major complication was pancreatic pseudocyst and abdominal fistula.
sentences.chinese: 併發症主要是胰外瘻和胰腺假性囊腫。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the synthesis of amylase in morphine dependent rat pancreas may be inhibited.
sentences.chinese: 提示嗎啡成癮大鼠胰澱粉酶合成受到抑制。

sentences.english: The correct formula for the determination of pancreatic amylase was established.
sentences.chinese: 並推導出胰澱粉酶的校正公式。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize a single center's experience of the prophylaxis and treatment of pancreatic fistula secondary to pancreaticoduodenectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胰十二指腸切除術後胰疹的預防與治療。

sentences.english: Objective To explore treatments of perioperative period in pancreaticoduodenectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索胰十二指腸切除術圍手術期治療。

sentences.english: You get glucagon from the pharmacy with a prescription from your doctor.
sentences.chinese: 你可以憑醫生的處方到藥店買來胰高血糖素。

sentences.english: Analyse the reviewing to the case of excising the skill of 24 cases of pancreas duodenum.
sentences.chinese: 對24例胰十二指腸切除術的病例進行回顧性分析。

sentences.english: To master the functions of insulin and glucagons , and understand their secretion regulation.
sentences.chinese: 掌握胰島素和胰高血糖素的作用，瞭解其分泌調節。

sentences.english: Conclusion Hepatopancreatic duct perfusing with collagenase is a good method for digestion.
sentences.chinese: 結論肝胰管內灌注膠原酶消化法是一種好的消化方法。

sentences.english: The gastrin and the glucagon cells were not found in the alimentary canal.
sentences.chinese: 在胃腸道均未發現胃泌素細胞和胰高血糖素細胞。

sentences.english: Objective To study CT manifestations of hepatic and pancreatic malignant fibrous histiocytoma(MFH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討肝胰惡性纖維組織細胞瘤的CT表現。

definition: jejunum (empty gut, middle segment of small intestine between duodenum 十二指腸|十二指肠[shi2 er4 zhi3 chang2] and ileum 回腸|回肠[hui2 chang2])
ileum (segment of small intestine between the jejunum 空腸|空肠[kong1 chang2] and appendix 盲腸|盲肠[mang2 chang2])
